Hellplague:
 
"I totally altered his behavior.  He is as evil and twisted as we are, sister.  He will be compelled to stay, he is a Minion also." Hellplague said, closing Malice's chest panel and getting off the bed.
"I'm going to get some energon.  Stay with him in case he wakes up before I return."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"Exist a way to prevent that he ran away in case that brainwashing 
fails"said the4 femme



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "There is always a chance that it will fail.  I am the best and I 
did everything I could.  But what brainwashing deals with is a bunch 
of unknowns."
> The grin faded a little, then Hellplague opened Malice's chest 
panel.  She put her finger on a small Autobot insignia then looked 
up at Blacknightmare.
> "See this?  It's a raised stamp that is on all Autobot spark 
chamber panels.  But watch this."
> The Sweep commander picked at the raised portion until it came 
off, revealing a depression with a Decepticon symbol etched in it.
> "He wasn't lying when he said he was the brother of Megatron.  His 
serial number, internal chronometer, it all matches.  He is the 
younger brothr of Megatron, so there's no telling what he is 
capable.  But we have him, it is highly unlikely that he will escape 
my brainwashing."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "I don't know how say this... exist any chance that he overcome 
> brain washing?"said the femme while she looked him
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > The femmes hoisted the bounty hunter off the table.  They carry 
> him as best they can back to his intial room and lay him on the 
> table.  Hellplague removed the weights on Malice's arms and legs.  
> She removes the sensor on his body, but puts one on his chest.  It 
> is connected to her comm link, so she may be in contact if there 
is 
> a problem with his re- activation.
> > "Now we wait.  See if an hour will revive him.  Our little 
> monster..." she said with a grin, all the while sitting on the bed 
> and carressing the hunter's face.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > BlackNightmare took the other side and waited to Hellplague 
signal
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > "I couldn't erase his memory, only software.  Who ever created 
> > this body for him must have reformatted his memory core, it's 
> > heavily encrypted and the data is so inter connected, simply 
> erasing 
> > anything would turn him into a protoform.  It would erase 
> > everything.  But don't worry, I modified his behavior, we won't 
> have 
> > any problems with him, even if he can get past the block I put 
on 
> > them."
> > > The Sweep commande pulled Malice to were he was siting up, and 
> > pulled one arm around her shoulders.  She pulled him to the edge 
> of 
> > the table and waited Blacknightmare to get his other side.
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare:
> > > 
> > > "To a bed..."said the femme"Did you erase and modified his 
> > memories?"
>
